meanings.definition: A person who works, especially for wages.
meanings.sent1: The workers at the factory operate the machines.
meanings.sent2: The workers in the office handle paperwork and answer calls.
meanings.sent3: The workers decided to have a dance-off during their break.
meanings.sent4: The workers are the gears that keep the company running smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The workers diligently complete their tasks every day.

meanings.definition: A person who is employed to perform physical or mental work.
meanings.sent1: The construction workers are building a new house in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The healthcare workers provide care and support to patients in the hospital.
meanings.sent3: The workers had a race to see who could finish their tasks first.
meanings.sent4: The workers are the engines that drive progress in society.
meanings.sent5: The workers tirelessly strive to improve their skills and knowledge.
